oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Data for "The genomic characterization of the t-haplotype, a mouse meiotic driver, highlights its complex history and specialized biology"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vicoso, Beatriz
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 576 Genetics and evolution
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This folder contains all the data used in each of the main figures of "The genomic characterization of the t-haplotype, a mouse meiotic driver, highlights its complex history and specialized biology" (Kelemen, R., Vicoso, B.), as well as in the supplementary figures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vicoso, Beatriz Data for "The genomic characterization of the t-haplotype, a mouse meiotic driver, highlights its complex history and specialized biology". [Data Collection] (Submitted)
